items.sentence: Tom expects Mary to stay in Boston until Monday.
Tom always dreamed of being a multi-millionaire.
The group of noisy boys was getting out of hand.
A known mistake is better than an unknown truth.
Are there any good movies being shown this week?
Tom wondered if Mary could be persuaded to help.
Tom wondered what Mary thought of his new house.
Tom wondered what Mary was trying to say to him.
Tom wondered what had made Mary do what she did.
Tom wondered where Mary had gone to high school.
We finally realized that we shouldn\'t be there.
We just don\'t want to deal with that right now.
I don\'t think it\'ll be hard to for me do that.
I don\'t think that Tom knows that you\'re here.
Tom hasn\'t heard from Mary in over three years.

Do you really want Tom to go to Boston with you?
Do you really want to sell your house right now?
Do you remember what happened the day I met you?
Do you think you could make a little less noise?
I wonder how long Tom has been living in Boston.
Tom listens to the radio whenever he\'s driving.
Tom and Mary ran into each other at the station.

Tom and Mary were both talking at the same time.
Tom and Mary were only married for a few months.

Tom Jackson is one of the richest men in Boston.

Tom doesn\'t think Mary will be able to do that.
Tom doesn\'t think doing this is worth our time.

I don\'t think that that\'s why Tom isn\'t here.

Tom and I were both at John and Mary\'s wedding.

I have a feeling I\'ve met her somewhere before.
Nobody I know ever paid sticker price for a car.
Tom and Mary are both from Boston, aren\'t they?
I\'ll get the money from Tom one way or another.
